title: Cure
subtitle: Cure Beauty
awwwards: Site of the day, Mobile excellence, Devaward
intro: Unique nail and wax boutique that curated a build-your-own style menu.
header: Cure is a unique nail and wax boutique.
It’is curated a build-your-own style menu by creating its own natural and organic skincare products that are used in services.
Cure was founded in 2018 in El Paso, Texas. At Cure we focus on customer experience, health and happiness.

content.header:
Great news!
We've got Site of the day on Awwwards for this website!
paragraphs: Cure’s goal is to provide El Paso a different type of nail & wax experience that I was aimed at demonstrating via the website, branding and content created.

content.header: The website also received Honorable Mention, Mobile Excellence and Development awards.
paragraphs: From logo creation to website design and animation, this project was so much fan to work on. I also had a chance to organize and lead the photo shoot to ensure the website and promo materials are leveraging unique visual content.
